channel.title: COD5 and COD4 > Any Other Xbox Game
channel.description:
You guys have got to admit, Call of Duty is actually a pretty damn good game. I'm going to get really sensitive, but if you actually understand how hard it is to create a game, you'd think this game is good. The gameplay on both is amazing, but I think the guns on COD4 are better, especially the snipers. On COD5, the maps are a bit larger, and there is plenty of space to move around in. The graphics are pretty much the same, I do not want to get into graphics.
If you want to know which game is better, Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare has been rated higher than Call of Duty: World At War. The Nazi Zombies on Call of Duty: World at War gets rid of the fact that it's a World War II game, and to be honest, World War II is used a lot in the game industry, so thumbs up to Nazi Zombies. Nazi Zombies is fun and entertaining, there's always action, but Call of Duty 4 is still kind of better (It's rated like .3 higher or something...).
Anyway, post here why or why not you like either games pl0x.

item.title: COD5 and COD4 > Any Other Xbox Game
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:27, topic:290399”][quote author=the bank link=topic=383905.msg2886683#msg2886683 date=1248655993]

basically, you play boring. all the methods of getting to high waves are playing like a nab
[/quote]I can’t play boring. Takes the fun out of a game.
[/quote]Unlock the Hell/Help door. Unlock the stairs in that room. Go to the back room with the 1 window and the other stairs. Chill in there. They only have one way in. Although, you only have one way out…[/quote]

Nah, unlock the first stairs then unlock the help room, with 4 people it’s easy to hold off, the advantages of this are: windows always locked, access to the box, and you can take shifts with the stairs.

Full Metalst:

So did COD1 and COD2.

COD2 is basically a good version of COD5, minus zombies.

Full Metalst:

Do you understand how hard it is to make a game…? Nope.

It’s fairly easy when you’re using a pre-made engine and have a team of professional game developers.

[quote=“Full Metalst, post:43, topic:290399”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=383905.msg2892126#msg2892126 date=1248967214]
theres nazi zombies, the only plus about the whole game the rest is a poorly mismashed peice of shit

I just like the suppressors, perks, levels. Maps are okay too. Campaign is “w00t”. I’d rather just try CREATING a game before talking SHIT about it. OMG caps WTF.[/quote]

See ^

Read full topic
item.source: COD5 and COD4 > Any Other Xbox Game

item.title: COD5 and COD4 > Any Other Xbox Game
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Full Metalst, post:39, topic:290399”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=383905.msg2891722#msg2891722 date=1248944241]

I’m a Republican, the only good Democrats so far are FDR and John F. Kennedy… So when did we get to talking about history when I’m talking about COD?

I agree Thug-Life, I like it better than some. Halo 3 is pretty fun, not sure why you guys don’t like it. Probably because you get the shit beat out of you lol.

Explains why all your information is bullshit.

Btw, COD5 sucks. I prefer Gears of war 2. COD5 is made by a shit company, COD4 isn’t.

Democrats are Union people, and they are OBAMA. OBAMA is a DEMOCRAT, and he is MUSLIM, and I don’t really think Bush did anything to ruin the US(if he did, then I don’t care). The only bad Republican was Richard Nixon, but the other ones were best :. I guess that’s because my whole family is based on Republicans and not faggot Democrats. So why is Treyarch a shit company if they are going to be the first company to ever create a Vietnam/Korean game?

Anyway, you can move this discussion to a history thread, not here…
[/quote]Because the game is going to be shit?

Treyarch is actually a great company, remember COD3? It was made by Treyarch. Do you understand how hard it is to make a game…? Nope. I like COD4 better, I just played it again after renting it at Blockbuster, then played it on Xbox Live. Amazing.

COD3 sucked dick

So did COD1 and COD2.[/quote]CoD2 was great, also yes i do understand how hard it is to make a game, I make games for the Xbox 360 via XNA and a microsoft developer license, so get your facts straight please you arrogant little fuck.

Read full topic
item.source: COD5 and COD4 > Any Other Xbox Game

item.title: COD5 and COD4 > Any Other Xbox Game
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“PeterMan, post:45, topic:290399”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=383905.msg2892115#msg2892115 date=1248967048]
also i never played a CoD game until 4 Medal of honour was so much better
[/quote]
I haven’t played any MoH games since Rising Sun. :S
CoD 4 was the first CoD game I played aswell.

You’re an idiot. Research your fucking facts so you don’t make a stupid statement… Obama isn’t Muslim, not that it would make a difference at all. Also, “Battlefield: Vietnam”.
P.S. Turning a blind eye to mishaps, whether made by a republican or not, just makes you even more of an idiot.

I can’t quite remember, but did BF Vietnam have any campaign mode?[/quote]
It’s been a while since I played, but I don’t think so, only instant action.

Read full topic

item.title: COD5 and COD4 > Any Other Xbox Game
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

[quote=“the bank, post:31, topic:290399”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=383905.msg2887156#msg2887156 date=1248687469]

I’m piss poor at nazi zombies, keep dying at wave 6 on the map that comes with the game (no map packs).

It’s almost depressing since I can beast anything to do with CoD4 (tenth prestige, all golden guns, all achievements and challenges all in the matter of 2 months, while maintaining a social life) and get to wave 24 on the one in the map pack.

Anyone (besides Full Metalst) got any tips?

I got to 22 by myself, so stop acting like a dick. I can help if I want to…

Do not open the Help door. Open up the stairs at round 4, then go down the other stairs on round 6/7. Stay in the Help room.

The Help room is best for 2-4 people, there are x4 the zombies with 4 players, x2 the zombies with 2 players (obviously). Nazi Zombies must be your flaw lol, I get to high waves on every game (on CoD5).

i never do it like this, i open the help door then those stairs in there and then go to the back of that room near where that cabinet is that forces a sniper rifle if you open it, get one person to watch the window and the rest of you to sit by the cabinet shooting zombies that come down
[/quote]This is what I would do with around 4 people, problem is I’m going solo for shitts and giggles.

Opening the help door first gets you the mystery box, which is win.[/quote]
The stairs is best for solo. The help room is best for 4 people imo.

Read full topic
item.source: COD5 and COD4 > Any Other Xbox Game
